name: Guess The MobileLegends Heroes QUIZ APP
name_original: Guess The MobileLegends Heroes QUIZ APP
description:
Guess The MobileLegends Heroes QUIZ APP

Test your Mobile Legends knowledge by this simple quiz.
Guess The Mobile Legends Heroes is a simple quiz app that test your knowledge in knowing of your favorite Mobile Legends heroes.
• Earn coins: use for hints, reveal words and solve the problem.
• Earn Gems: to top the leader board.
